sentences.sContent: They corralled the cattle before loading them onto the truck.
sentences.sCn: 他们在把牛装上车以前，先把牛赶入了畜栏。

synos.tran: 把…关进畜栏；捕捉；把…布成车阵

remMethod.val: corr(=curr跑) + al → (不让)动物跑掉 → 关进畜栏

trans.tranOther: to make animals move into a corral
a fairly small enclosed area where cattle, horses etc can be kept temporarily, especially in North America
